EmailTemplate.name: Inbound Inquiry Response- State In Which We Are Actively Recruiting
EmailTemplate.subject: Palmetto - Interested in Partnering?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.Name},
I hope this message finds you well. I noticed you recently expressed interest in partnering with Palmetto Solar in {STATE}. Iâ€™d like to arrange a time to discuss your interest, experience, and our build partner program? We'll need between 30 and 45 minutes to talk through everything and answer all your questions. You can Use This Meeting Link to view my availability and schedule a time directly on my calendar.
Please let me know if you have any questions or topics you'd like to make sure we cover during our conversation.
Cheers,
